sub_title: People Lead at Xebia - Brewer at Bierbrouwerij De Magistraat - Diplom Biersommelier
summary:
With a background in software development and Chinese linguistics, Léon Rodenburg possesses an unconventional combination of hard and soft skills that can help organisations accelerate their existing development projects or engineer new tech stacks from the bottom up. As a consultant at Xebia, he strives to tackle issues head-on, to challenge organisations to get the most out of their IT and to present no-nonsense solutions in a clear-cut way. He can help you implement both front and back end stacks using a multitude of languages and tools, guiding you in your decisions along the way.

As a speaker of Mandarin and frequent visitor of China, Léon has experienced Chinese technology and social media platforms first-hand. Using that experience, he can advise you when it comes to Chinese digital strategy, marketing and social media, connecting your existing IT landscape to the enormous potential of the Chinese market.
